SEARCH
Package com.APP.Project.UserCoreLogic.phases

Class Phase

java.lang.Object
com.APP.Project.UserCoreLogic.phases.Phase
Direct Known Subclasses:
End, GamePlay, MapEditor
public abstract class Phase extends Object
Phase class represents an abstract phase in the game. It provides methods to load, show, edit, validate, and save maps, as well as methods to edit continents, countries, and neighbors, set players, assign countries, and perform reinforcement, issuing orders, fortification, ending the game, transitioning to the next state, and handling invalid commands. This class also includes a method to invoke dynamic methods based on input parameters.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Rikin Dipakkumar Chauhan
